questions.question: How do I start selling on Jamla.ma?
questions.answer: Simply create an account, choose your products, and start listing them in our marketplace.

questions.question: Do I need to invest money to start?
questions.answer: No, you can start selling without any upfront investment or inventory costs.

questions.question: How do I get paid?
questions.answer: You will receive your earnings within 24-48 hours after each sale.

questions.question: What support do you provide?
questions.answer: We handle all customer service, returns, and technical support for you.
